text:
Water Street, south side, at Gouverneur Slip. The building outlined against Gouverneur Hospital, is No. 12 Gouverneur Slip, and is at the S.W. corner of Water Street.
March 23, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Water Street, south side and Gouverneur Slip, showing the Gouverneur Hospital. Photograph was taken from the S.E. corner of Montgomery St. looking across the vacant lots 6-8-10 on the West side of Gouverneur Slip.
April 23rd, 1939

P.L. Sperr,
title: Manhattan: Water Street - Gouverneur Slip

title: Manhattan: Water Street - Gouverneur Slip

text:
VLADECK HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
Laying the cornerstone - dedication Mar. 24, 1940. Participants include: Mayor Fiorello H. LaGuardia
Newbold Morris (behind the Mayor)
Frances Perkins (Secretary of Labor) holding bag.
Photographer: Armand Le Ray?
title: Manhattan: Water Street - Gouverneur Slip

text:
Water Street, n.s., looking e. fr. Gouverneur Slip, showing the Gouverneur Hospital on the s. side and on the n. side, the new Vladeck Houses.

P. L. Sperr, photographer
July 3, 1940
title: Manhattan: Water Street - Gouverneur Slip
